Uses of Class
net.openhft.chronicle.ChronicleConfig

  • Packages that use ChronicleConfig 
    Package Description
    net.openhft.chronicle  
    net.openhft.chronicle.tcp  

    • Uses of ChronicleConfig in net.openhft.chronicle

      Fields in net.openhft.chronicle declared as ChronicleConfig 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.DEFAULT
      The default ChronicleConfig used by various Chronicle implementations if not otherwise specified.
      static ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.HUGE
      A pre-defined ChronicleConfig for huge Chronicle instances.
      static ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.LARGE
      A pre-defined ChronicleConfig for large Chronicle instances.
      static ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.MEDIUM
      A pre-defined ChronicleConfig for medium Chronicle instances.
      static ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.SMALL
      A pre-defined ChronicleConfig for small Chronicle instances.
      static ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.TEST
      A pre-defined ChronicleConfig for test Chronicle instances.
      Methods in net.openhft.chronicle that return ChronicleConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.byteOrder(ByteOrder byteOrder)
      Sets the byte order to be used when serializing into/from the backing files.
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.cacheLineSize(int cacheLineSize)
      Sets the size of the index cache lines.
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.clone()
      Makes ChronicleConfig cloneable.
      ChronicleConfig IndexedChronicle.config()
      Returns the ChronicleConfig that has been used to create the current instance of IndexedChronicle
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.dataBlockSize(int dataBlockSize)
      Sets the size to be used for data blocks.
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.indexBlockSize(int indexBlockSize)
      Sets the size to be used for index blocks.
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.indexFileCapacity(int indexFileCapacity)
      Sets the capacity to be used for index files.
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.indexFileExcerpts(int indexFileExcerpts)
      Sets the number of excerpts in the index file.
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.messageCapacity(int messageCapacity)
      The maximum size a message stored in a Chronicle instance can have.
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.synchronousMode(boolean synchronousMode)
      Sets the synchronous mode to be used.
      ChronicleConfig ChronicleConfig.useUnsafe(boolean useUnsafe)
      Specifies if Unsafe should be used by the Chronicle instance being configured.
      Constructors in net.openhft.chronicle with parameters of type ChronicleConfig 
      Constructor and Description
      IndexedChronicle(String basePath, ChronicleConfig config)
      Creates a new instance of IndexedChronicle as specified by the provided ChronicleConfig and having the specified basePath (the base name of the two backing files).
